title: Corporal, 17th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Corporal has a center of red cut and uncut velvet in a large-scale symmetrical foliate design with a border of polychrome cut and uncut velvet on a white satin ground in a floral design. Trimmed with gold ribbon and backed with red wool.

tombstone.epitaph:
Corporal, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk, wool, metallic trim. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-84.
